I'm not OP, but I've only had two best friends in my whole life. The way we became best friends at first was pretty awkward--we've all been polar opposites ready to challenge each other. I made my best friends by wanting to be around that person, or being forced into situations where I had to be. You just click with that person.
tldr; Even if you're an introvert, try to accept and be around others. Like OP said, if there is chemistry, things will work out.
How do you see yourself vs. how the world around you sees you?
